byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah contributed reporting from Kandahar, Afghanistan, and Najim Rahim from Kunduz.

abstract: American soldier is killed after roadside bomb explodes in Kabul, Afghanistan; casualty reflects United States increased involvement in combat as Afghan forces struggle against Taliban attacks.

headline.print_headline: Roadside Bomb Kills American Soldier Near Besieged Afghan City
headline.main: Bomb Kills an American Soldier Near Besieged Afghan City

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: United States forces have been drawn more heavily into the defense of Lashkar Gah, the Helmand provincial capital under direct threat by the Taliban....
lead_paragraph: United States forces have been drawn more heavily into the defense of Lashkar Gah, the Helmand provincial capital under direct threat by the Taliban.
